participant_1.name: Emma Thompson
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and warm-hearted, Emma loves engaging with people and spreading positivity.
participant_1.background: She grew up in a small town and has always valued community and friendships.

participant_2.name: Liam Scott
participant_2.personality: Friendly and outgoing, Liam enjoys making new connections and is always up for a good conversation.
participant_2.background: Liam comes from a diverse background and has traveled extensively, which has shaped his open-minded views.
